game_description: Magitek VR is a magic adventure game that uses physics driven spells based on the four elements. Use magic to fight enemies and solve puzzles as you explore the world of Embra. GESTURE BASED MAGIC Spell casting is intricate and dynamic. Each class of magic will behave based on a set of physical properties each requiring new skills and training to fully master. The demo has access to both Fire and Air magic. INTERACTIVE ENVIROMENT Grass will ignite with fire, ice will melt, water will freeze and iron will heat up and spread heat. Use this to create creative ways to fight enemies and solve puzzles. AND MUCH MORE! And much more! RPG System: Power up spells to suit your style Weapons and item: Over 15 weapons and items including; swords, spears, shields, archery and magic fruit that can be eaten to give you magically boosts. Physics based enemies: Push, pull and interact with enemies with both weapons and spells.
review_1: I like the game but it needs some combos and more water spells in the demo so please add more water spells or can someone gift me the full version please I been wanting it for 7 months now
review_2: I love this so much I haven’t tried the full version but I bet it is a lot better then the demo I hope y’all can help with some teaching stuff to like with earth fist and wall dice it took me some time to figure it out. Y’all have made a great game here. I also tried this long ago too I’m OG.
review_4: Well, to put it simply I have stick drift, and I can’t play games without someway to turn off manual turning, but when I got on, you can’t even turn it off. I was starting feel sick and had to get off. And couldn’t cast spells without spinning, so it would be nice to add the feature to turn off smooth turn
review_5: It's a good game but it's a little laggy and it would be a lot better with slowmo
